00024 class boostfd_request;

00027 class boostfd_file : public file
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     typedef boost::iostreams::file_descriptor fd_type;
00031 protected:
00032     fd_type file_des;
00033     int mode_;
00034 private:
00035     boostfd_file();
00036 public:
00037     boostfd_file(const std::string & filename, int mode, int disk = -1);
00038     fd_type get_file_des() const;
00039     ~boostfd_file();
00040     stxxl::int64 size ();
00041     void set_size(stxxl::int64 newsize);
00042     request_ptr aread(
00043         void * buffer,
00044         stxxl::int64 pos,
00045         size_t bytes,
00046         completion_handler on_cmpl);
00047     request_ptr awrite(
00048         void * buffer,
00049         stxxl::int64 pos,
00050         size_t bytes,
00051         completion_handler on_cmpl);
00052 };
00053 
00055 class boostfd_request : public request
00056 {
00057     friend class boostfd_file;
00058 protected:
00059     // states of request
00060     enum { OP = 0, DONE = 1, READY2DIE = 2 }; // OP - operating, DONE - request served,
00061                                               // READY2DIE - can be destroyed
00062 
00063     state _state;
00064  #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00065     boost::mutex waiters_mutex;
00066  #else
00067     mutex waiters_mutex;
00068  #endif
00069     std::set < onoff_switch * > waiters;
00070 
00071     boostfd_request (
00072         boostfd_file * f,
00073         void * buf,
00074         stxxl::int64 off,
00075         size_t b,
00076         request_type t,
00077         completion_handler on_cmpl);
00078 
00079     bool add_waiter (onoff_switch * sw);
00080     void delete_waiter (onoff_switch * sw);
00081     int nwaiters (); // returns the number of waiters
00082     void check_aligning ();
00083     void serve ();
00084 
00085     // Following methods are declared but not implemented
00086     // intentionnaly to forbid their usage
00087     boostfd_request(const boostfd_request &);
00088     boostfd_request & operator=(const boostfd_request &);
00089     boostfd_request();
00090 
00091 public:
00092     virtual ~boostfd_request ();
00093     void wait ();
00094     bool poll();
00095     const char * io_type ();
00096 };
